tasks.label: üèóÔ∏è Build Docker Container
tasks.command: echo 'Building Docker container...' && docker build -t bun-cockpit-container .devcontainer/ && echo '‚úÖ Container built successfully!'

tasks.label: üöÄ Start Dev Server
tasks.command: if [ -z  "$CONTAINER" ]; then docker run -it -v ${workspaceFolder}:/workspace -p 5173:5173 bun-cockpit-container dev; else bun dev --host 0.0.0.0; fi

tasks.label: üì¶ Install Dependencies
tasks.command: if [ -z  "$CONTAINER" ]; then docker run -v ${workspaceFolder}:/workspace bun-cockpit-container install; else bun install; fi

tasks.label: üß™ Run Tests
tasks.command: if [ -z  "$CONTAINER" ]; then docker run -v ${workspaceFolder}:/workspace bun-cockpit-container test; else bun test; fi

tasks.label: üî® Build
tasks.command: if [ -z  "$CONTAINER" ]; then docker run -v ${workspaceFolder}:/workspace bun-cockpit-container run build; else bun run build; fi

tasks.label: üßπ Clean Install
tasks.command: if [ -z  "$CONTAINER" ]; then docker run -v ${workspaceFolder}:/workspace bun-cockpit-container bash -c "rm -rf node_modules bun.lockb && bun install"; else rm -rf node_modules bun.lockb && bun install; fi
